custom-object.object-attribute: (PLACEHOLDER) As it only exists in Productio it is disabled in SANDBOXES. Export CSV of coupons and associated promotions to ExactTarget FTP (for CP)
SFTPs employee relatives XML file from the Amazon EC2 instance and imports it into the system
SFTPs Nike OMS requests file from the Amazon EC2 instance and imports it into the system
SFTPs order tracking file for inline orders from the Amazon EC2 instance and imports it into the system
SFTPs order tracking file for DYO orders from the Amazon EC2 instance and imports it into the system
(SANDBOX)Exports Product Information Report to Converse FTP
This job exports customers marked as "deleted" into a XML file and then runs customer import in the DELETE mode using that file

(PLACEHOLDER) This ONLY exists in PRODUCTION. Putting here for DISABLING it in SANDBOXES.Exports Performics product feed _ddi.txt for each EMEA site into local IMPEX folder without transferring them anywhere. Transfer to a remote SFTP host is done by TransferOut-Performics_EMEA workflow.
Export Products Information To Site Catalyst
SFTPs stores file from the Amazon EC2 instance and imports it into the system
(SANDBOX) Placeholder for disabling this workflow that ONLY exists in PRODUCTION. Export products_converse.csv to ExactTarget FTP (for CP)
This job process all updated orders and sets the information needed for email sending. Email sending itself is handled by another job.
SCHEDULED for Prod - SFTPs order tracking file for Arvato for inline orders from the Amazon EC2 instance and imports it into the system
SCHEDULED - Import US inventory feed from Genesco
SCHEDULED on Prod - Import Inventory from Arvato
ON DEMAND - Download and import all siteCatalogs from DataHub.
ON DEMAND - Import all pricebooks and sales pricebooks for all sites
SCHEDULED - Download and import ALL data feeds from PIM (masterCatalog, siteCatalogs, pricebooks)
ON DEMAND - Download and import masterCatalog xml from DataHub
(SANDBOX)ON DEMAND - Rebuild Product Search Indexes (to be run in each Site scope after catalog imports). Runs on schedule elsewhere.
Weekly Export of Employee Orders from EMEA sites. This jobs runs on every EMEA site and exports orders that were had promotion EMEA.EmployeeDiscount applied.
(SANDBOX)Weekly Employee (@converse.com, @nike.com) report sent weekly to Converse FTP

Reads csv file with Employee Records and then updates matching (by email address) User Profiles by updating its employeeActive and employeeID attributes. This job should run in each of the EMEA site (except for NL, which has a its own job to do this), because Employee eligibility is not site specific and we don't yet have Master Record in place to track eligibility across sites.
Import of Weekly Employee Data from Nike for EMEA sites

The purpose of this job is the same as ImportEmployeeData. However, b/c we need to process the same file against all EMEA sites, but only archive one copy, this job will run the last for just one site, and clean up after itself by archiving the data file.
Import of Weekly Employee Data from Nike for NL site and cleanup
SFTP transfer of file with Nike OMS requests for EMEA from DATAHUB
Daily import of Nike OMS requests for EMEA sites, which is used to update DYO order status
Import Nike OMS requests for EMEA
This job runs a bit later than its counterparts on the other EMEA sites and performs a cleanup by removing the datafile after it is imported
Import Nike OMS requests for EMEA and cleanup
On demand job to generate perpetual inventory for all DYO products based on what is available in DE site catalog.
Create perpetual DYO inventory for EMEA sites
(SANDBOX)Daily export of orders from each EMEA site, run in the context of that site

This is a placeholder for SFTP transfer of Nike employee verification file. We don't have NIKE credentials, and because of that use DataHub test SFTP to facilitate the transfer. NOTE: please DO NOT MODIFY THIS Workflow. Send all modification requests to converse-dev@tacitknowledge.com
SFTP Transfer of Weekly Employees file from NIKE
(FROM PRODUCTION)Transfers files with inline and DYO order status updates from Genesco (via Datahub's sftp) and processed them

(FROM PRODUCTION)SCHEDULED for Prod - SFTPs order tracking file from Arvato for BE inline orders and imports it into the system

(PLACEHOLDER) It only exists in PRODUCTION. Putting this place holder for disable it in SANDBOXES. Export daily order file on demand. Does not send file to any endpoint.
